body:
When submitting a new action (`POST /api/v1/actions/`), if the contents of the file are exactly the same as another file, the API gives an error. That might be ok? Or maybe we want to silently de-dupe to the existing file?

Either way, a larger issue is that the error is a 500 caused by a server error. The error is `Key (implementation_hash)=(d77ebfb1abdf63aa3ce992ab601c9507941ec865) already exists`. [Here is a full traceback](https://gist.github.com/mythmon/11f285f19eb04db4d319). We should at least give a nicer error message that includes the details of what went wrong, instead of a server error.
